page.title: 06N.Duffield.Peoples jobs.
page.content: We ran a survey of 16 families who live in North Duffield to find out what they did,where they work,and the time they leave and return from work. We asked the same questions of both men and women.Of the people we asked 3 work in the village,4 work in nearby Selby,and 9 work else where. In the men we asked,5 work in farming,4 are in business,3 work for the community,2 work in factories and 2 work at the newly opened Selby coalfield.In the women 11 work as housewives,3 work for a business,1 works for the community and 1 works in a pub. 2 people we asked leave for work between 6-7am,6 leave between 7-8am,5 leave between 8-9am,2 work on shifts and 2 leave at other times.We asked when they returned.6 return at 6-7pm. 1 at 7-8pm. 1 at 8-9pm.2 people after their shifts,and 4 at other times.
